response.original_title: All the Money in the World
response.overview: The story of the kidnapping of 16-year-old John Paul Getty III and the desperate attempt by his devoted mother to convince his billionaire grandfather Jean Paul Getty to pay the ransom.
response.tagline: J. Paul Getty had a fortune. Everyone else paid the price.
response.title: All the Money in the World

release_dates.note: Scener med nærgående og blodige volds- og drapsskildringer gjør at denne filmen får 15-årsgrense.
